headline: Gartner (IT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Gartner on Seeking Winners’ Substack. As of 1st July, Gartner’s share was trading at $406.07. IT’s trailing and forward P/E were 25.39 and 30.83 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Gartner is considered the preeminent authority in technology research, functioning as the ‘ratings agency of tech’. Its market dominance, […]
